About

Wangchuk Dem Homestay in Phobjikha, Bhutan, offers a serene escape amidst the captivating beauty of Phobjikha Valley. Nestled in the heart of the valley, this charming homestay provides comfortable accommodation with traditional Bhutanese decor and stunning valley views. Guests can savor authentic Bhutanese cuisine and embark on nature walks to witness the endangered black-necked cranes or explore nearby monasteries. The hosts' warm Bhutanese hospitality and opportunities for stargazing under the pristine night sky make Wangchuk Dem Homestay a perfect blend of nature, culture, and tranquility for a memorable Bhutanese experience.
